issue.title: [C++] Vendor CMake's UseJava
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4426](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4426). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In order to provide gandiva JNI bindings for for Ubuntu 16.04 and 18.04 We need to vendor UseJava, because GENERATE_NATIVE_HEADERS is avilable since CMake 3.11 and Ubuntu 18.04 ships CMake 3.10.

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3522
